JsavLinkedListObject Index¶

class JsavLinkedListObject(codeObject, av)¶

This class represents the JSAV linked list object thea will be used in the visualization

Class constructor

Arguments:
  • codeObject (JSAVpesudocodeobject) – This object is used to show the student code in the slide show
  • av (JSAV) – the JSAV object that is used to draw the visualizations
JsavLinkedListObject.CreateCircularArrow(last, first)¶

connects the last node with the first node

Arguments:
  • last (JSAVNode) –
  • first (JSAVNode) –
JsavLinkedListObject.add(index, data, ref)¶

Creates and adds a new node at the specified index of the list.

Arguments:
  • index (Integer) – The specified index on the list
  • data (Object) – The created node data
  • ref (String) – The created node memory reference.
JsavLinkedListObject.addFirst(data, ref)¶

Creates and adds a new node at the first of the list.

Arguments:
  • data (Object) – The created node data
  • ref (String) – The created node memory reference.
JsavLinkedListObject.addLast(data, ref)¶

Creates and adds a new node at the end on the list.

Arguments:
  • data (Object) – The created node data
  • ref (String) – The created node memory reference.
JsavLinkedListObject.connection(obj1, obj2)¶

Draws a link from obj1 to obj2

Arguments:
  • obj1 (JSAVNode) –
  • obj2 (JSAVNode) –
Returns:

the new link
JsavLinkedListObject.convertToCircularList()¶

Converts the list to Circular linked list

JsavLinkedListObject.first()¶

returns the first JSAV node in the list

JsavLinkedListObject.get(index)¶

returns the node at the specified index on the list.

Arguments:
  • index (Integer) – The specified index of the list
JsavLinkedListObject.getJsavLinkedList()¶

returns the JSAV Linked list object.

JsavLinkedListObject.getNodeIndexByReference(reference)¶

Returns the index of the node with the given reference

Arguments:
  • reference (String) – the reference value that used to find the node index
JsavLinkedListObject.getNodeIndexByValue(value)¶

Returns the index of the node with the given value

Arguments:
  • value (Object) – the value that used to find the node index
JsavLinkedListObject.getNodeNotPartOfTheListByData(data)¶

Search for a node that is not in the linked list.

Arguments:
  • data (Object) – The data will be used to find the requested node
Returns:

the linked list node
JsavLinkedListObject.last()¶

returns the last JSAV node in the list

JsavLinkedListObject.layout()¶

redraw the JSAV linked list

JsavLinkedListObject.newNode(data)¶

Create new node in the JSAV linked list. This node is not part of the list yet.

Arguments:
  • data (Object) – the linked list node data
Returns:

the new JSAV linked list node
JsavLinkedListObject.position()¶

returns the position of the JSAV linked list object

JsavLinkedListObject.remove(index)¶

removes the node at the specified index on the list.

Arguments:
  • index (Integer) – The specified index of the list
JsavLinkedListObject.size()¶

returns the size of the linked list
